department: HRSS: Organization and Classification, Staffing and Compensation
short_summary: Task and Solutions Professional Services for the assessment of competencies.
description: The CBSA is seeking a provider and administrator of online assessment tools (web-based)as well as all related assessment services to develop and support new tools and testing for the assessment of competencies. The successful bidder must be able to provide the services of Senior, Intermediate and Junior level resources.
